thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Promotional Apparel Internet Business

title: Promotional Apparel Internet Business
text: Questions Business Summary For sale is a custom apparel decorating business in Canada. This business prints on apparel (decorated with screen print, digital print, or embroidery) and then products are shipped to the customer. The business has invested heavily in prior years to develop a large efficient website with an online design platform. This enables users to perform on-line quoting and then progress to creating/uploading their design, choosing a type of apparel and ordering/paying online. Current owner wants to focus on the physical printing side of the business and hand the internet portion of the business over to a new owner that can do bigger things with it. Overall this is a business that is poised for growth. Highlights & Key Assets: o Buys blank (no design) apparel from high quality manufacturers. o Business name is trademarked, giving any brand name product it creates a legal protection. o The business is known for its high quality print and timely delivery. As a result, many customers remain loyal and continue to re-order. o Current focus has been mostly on one province in Canada but can be instantly expanded across other provinces and the US. o Aged website domain which has had SEO performed on it for many years. o New PPC campaign created in May 2015 by a proven professional PPC company. o Power of highly skilled print house to grow the business and maintain the same quality. o Seller will help grow with the new owner. The new owner will benefit from their in-house expert print production. The new owner will not need to have any stock of any sort. o The new owner will be able to get into the brand line apparel part of predesign and start to sell directly on the Amazon and Google Shopping feeds. Current owner will print all orders and help the new owner with creations of new design for predesign and branding of apparel. Financials
